question:
A restaurant has placed an advertisement for waiters and waitresses in your local newspaper.

Write a letter to the restaurant, applying for the job. In your letter:

explain what you are currently doing
text: I am writing this letter to express my keen interest in the job opening for waiter in your prominent restaurant. I came across this opportunity in yesterday's newspaper and believing that my experience aligns with the requirement of this role.

Let me explain my skills in more detail. As I am currently studying in the Hotel Management course from the university and I am also working  as a part-time waiter in the university cafeteria since last year. However, now I am interested to find out another position as soon as possible as my exam will finish next week. In addition to part-time worker, I learned the very basic skills required for this place like serving food to customers, exceptional customers service skills and communication skills. However, I am eagerly waiting for using these skills to improve my performance.

Furthermore, I am very reliable and trustworthy, have a friendly, outgoing personality and enjoy dealing with the public. It will be a great opportunity for me to work with reputed restaurants like yours.Meanwhile, I am ready for the immediate start and also available for interview anytime offering.
I hope  you would consider my skills to your work and give me a chance to prove myself in creating field.
I look forward to hearing from you.
